title: Rounding up the games industry's best jokes, japery, and doggone tomfoolery from April Fools 2023
description: Oh my gosh, I can't believe they went there.

title: That Musk-signed open letter calling for a pause on AI development is getting blasted by the very researchers it cites
description: To be clear, they still want the way we approach AI tech to change dramatically.

title: Thank goodness Corsair's 'Elite Tactile Distractors' aren't a real product, or else I'd never get anything done
description: I'll never pay attention in a meeting ever again.

title: Wordle hint and answer #651: Saturday, April 1
description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for Saturday's puzzle.

title: Dark and Darker dev starts and then pauses GoFundMe for Nexon legal battle: 'The reality of the situation is that their end goal is to bleed us dry in court fees'
description: The GoFundMe was published "prematurely," but it managed to raise over $46k in under an hour.
